segments.text: Can I borrow your Cds for our school dance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you don't ask much , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I promise I will personally guard every single one and they will come back in perfect condition .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll tell you what . Your class can rent them from me for the night and buy back any damaged ones .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds fair . That's still cheaper than paying a band to come play for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not as fun though . A live band is way more exciting !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our class doesn't have enough money . We already checked into it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me know with your next dance . I know a band that may give you a break for the publicity .
segments.speaker: S2
